key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including compliance and data privacy issues
Market and economic sensitivity, particularly to interest rate fluctuations and economic downturns
Competitive pressures from traditional insurers and fintech disruptors
Reputation and ethical concerns stemming from past controversies
controversies: Settled charges with the SEC for financial reporting and internal control violations
In Re Prudential Ins. Co. Sales Practices Litigation involving unethical sales practices and document destruction
Halting term life insurance sales through Wells Fargo following employee lawsuits
environmental_issues: Investments in green bonds and ESG initiatives, though effectiveness and impact remain under scrutiny
social_issues: Ethical concerns related to sales practices and claims handling
Commitment to financial inclusion programs as part of ESG initiatives
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and past legal penalties for financial reporting and internal control violations
Reputational damage from historical controversies affecting governance standards
